PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: Base Address
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: This base address is used by SW to program CP_TRACER

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Address Interval
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The the address interval between two consective CP_TRACER modules

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Total Target
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The total number of the CP_Trace modules

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Devide Factor
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The clock divide factor for each model

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Monitor
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for selecting the target for the transaction to watch

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Function
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for the function to perform by CP_Tracer module

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Function
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for the function to perform by CP_Tracer module

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Statistics Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for the statistics type.

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Bandwidth Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for enabling two bus bandwidth, or one bus bandwidth with percentage of bus throughput

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Statistics Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for the statistics type.

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Bandwidth Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for enabling two bus bandwidth, or one bus bandwidth with percentage of bus throughput

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Average Access Size
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Average transaction size

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Bus Utilization
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Average number of access per clock cycles

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Bus Contention
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Average percentage of wait time

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Min. Average Latency
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Average wait time for each access

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Master
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for enabling the masters for the transaction to the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Master 0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for enabling the masters for the transaction 0 (throughput 0) to the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Master 1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for enabling the masters for the transaction 1 (throughput 1) to the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Filter
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Filters for the transaction between enabled master(s) and the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Filter
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Filters for the transaction between enabled master(s) and the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Filter 0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Filters for the transaction 0 (throughput 0) between enabled master(s) and the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Filter 0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Filters for the transaction 0 (throughput 0) between enabled master(s) and the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Filter 1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Filters for the transaction 1 (throughput 1) between enabled master(s) and the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Filter 1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Filters for the transaction 1 (throughput 1) between enabled master(s) and the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Event Filter
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Filters for the generating triggering or exporting event for the enabled master(s)

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Event Filter
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Filters for the generating triggering or exporting event for the enabled master(s)

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Export Configuration
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for the configuration of the request to the target

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Export Configuration
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for the configuration of the request to the target

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Export Access Status
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Output the event message of the requests from all the masters

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Sample Interval
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Event message can not be sent out more than once in the defined interval. Zero means message is sent out after Sample Window expired

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Export New Request Event
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Output the event message of the requests from the selected masters

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Export Last Burst Event
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Include the trace data on burst access to the target

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Export Last Write of Burst
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Export the message of the last write to the target for a burst write

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Export Last Read of Burst
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Export the message of the last read to the target for a burst write

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Export Counter Values
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Output counter values for statistics caculation

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Sample Window
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: Measurement interval for detecting statistics event

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: EMU Trigger
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for configuring EMU trigger as input or output

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Generate Interrupt
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Generate interrupt after sample window expires.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Address Range Filter
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Trace event only in the defined memory address range

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: EMU Trigger Filter
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Trace is asserted by EMU0 and EMU1 pin

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Address Mask
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Set the 10 bit of the address associated with the event to be exported

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Event Priority
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option setting the priority of the event

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger Output
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for selecting EMU0 and EMU1 as trigger output

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Trigger EMU0
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: EMU0 is asserted when the event has occurred

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Trigger EMU1
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: EMU1 is asserted when the event has occurred

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Transaction Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for enabling the access masters for the request

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: CPU Data Access
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Initiated by CPU data access

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: CPU Instruction Access
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Initiated by CPU Instruction access

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: DMA Access
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Initiated by DMA access

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Access Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Read or write qualifier for the request

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Address Extension
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The upper address setting for more than 32 bit addresses

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Exclusive Address
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the exclusive address filtering

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Num Grant Counter Enable
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the num grant counter for the caculation of average access size and bus utilization

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Wait Counter Enable
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the wait counter for the caculation of percentage of time that was contention for the bus and minimum average latency

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Display Settings
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Input information for trace display

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Clock Rate(Mhz)
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The clock rate for converting clock cycles to seconds

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Suppress Zeros
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Enable the num grant counter for the caculation of average access size and bus utilization
